name: Project ACruelAngelsThesis
description:
Project ACruelAngelsThesis is a top-down roguelite stealth game created in 14 days by Speedcrew Entertainments for My First Game Jam: Winter2020.

As in any good stealth game, you can't just run up to your enemies and hit them in the face! You have to sneak up behind them and backstab them. 

The game currently features a couple of rooms, a few unique items and a final boss fight, but more will definitely come in future updates.

EPILEPSY WARNING: The game is very flashy, so be careful if you have any background of epilepsy or similar!

Post Jam Update 1: Fixed a game breaking bug
